title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Tawngtai hlawhtlintirtu 313
Tawngtai hun hlu tawngtai hun hlu 269
Tawpna nia ka hringnun hi a ral hunin 524
Thawnthu hlui chu min hrilh rawh 339
Thian chuti ang ka hriat hmaa 135
Thian tha Isua rawngbawl turin 349
Thianghlim Thianghlim Thianghlim Engkimtithei Pathian 1
Thihna lo thleng tur kan nghah chu 463
Thihna lui piahah khawpui mawi tak chu a awm 466
Thil mak chhui sen loh kan Pathian 33
Thil tha kan hmuh ang hi 34
Thim a awm tawh lo vang A lo kalin 234
Thim zingah ka awm tawh a 519
Thimin lei a tuam laiin 106
Thinlung ngui fuih tur an awm a 344
Thisen hlu thisen hlu 179
Thlalera ka vahvaih chhung hian 30
Thlalera vak ka lo nih hi 314
Thlamuanna lawmawm chu 439
Thlanah a lo awm ta (A tho ta a tho ta) 232
Thlarau bote chhandam rawh 319
Thlarau thianghlim meialh leh chhumdinga hruaitu 503
Thlarau Thianghlim nunna ber 304
Thlarau thianghlim rawn tir ang che 307
Thlarau Thianghlim thlamuantu 310
Thlarau Thianghlim thuro nunnem 306
Thlem thluk thelh awmin 330
Thlemnaah lut suh la luh chu sual a ni 406
Thu mak ka sawi nin theih loh chu 209
Thuhnuairawlh takin Lal Isuan min ko va 327
Tlai lama ni a tlak dawn khan 279
Tlaitla eng mawi kawngkhar hawn tur chu 458
Tlang mawi tak chu a awm ram hla takah chuanin 207
Tlang thim chhak lam kei ka en ang 246
Tlantu ka nei e vanah min dilsak thin 436
Tu nge lo leng leiah hian 538
Tuifinriat ang khawngaihna hi 137
Tuifinriata mi vakvaiten 152
Tunah a thar hmangaihna eng nuamah 455
Tunah hnehin leh ngam zel turin 401
Tunah Isu Nangma hnenah 584
Tunah ka awih ka awih ang e 598
